channel.title: Prabhadevi on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Prabhadevi on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Le Ciel
item.description: While rain still continues in South Asian countries; People from Karachi to Dhaka are facing this year after monsoon-effects with this heavy downpour. This monsoon is considered to be most well-known and potent. So, I thought to put a picture with blue evening sky to cheer up ;). BTW this is Gammon House situated at Prabhadevi next to Sidhi Vinayak Temple.
